## SPRelationBDTO class

Backend DTO for sp-relations. Based on [RelationModel](https://gitlab.fokus.fraunhofer.de/learning-technologies/clm-framework/clm-core/-/blob/dev/docs/clm-core.relationmodel.md)

The instance of [spRelationBDTOInstance](./clm-ext-service_providers.sprelationbdtoinstance.md) is provided. Uses as default [MariaAdapter](https://gitlab.fokus.fraunhofer.de/learning-technologies/clm-framework/clm-core/-/blob/dev/docs/clm-core.mariaadapter.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SPRelationBDTO 
```
